name: Doom Go
description: Experience the world of “Doom” in an all new, tabletop format inspired by “Hitman Go”! Step into the role of the Doom Slayer and stop the invasion of Hell’s demons on Mars in exhilarating turn-based combat. Pass through levels from the surface of Mars to the Underworld itself, completing objectives as the demons of Hell close in on you step-by-step. Your goal? The destruction of Humanity’s greatest threat: the Spider Mastermind. Utilize a diverse range of weapons and gather health to survive the journey, and above all else -- watch your step.
